heading: HR02230
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON GOOD GOVERNMENT AND PUBLIC ACCOUNTABILITY TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY AND INVESTIGATION, INTO THE ALLEGATIONS OF IRREGULARITIES AND ANOMALIES IN THE OPERATION OF THE DUTY FREE PHILIPPINES CORPORATION (DFPC), PARTICULARLY WITH REGARDS TO ALLEGED VIOLATIONS OF R.A. NO. 6768, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE BALIKBAYAN LAW, AS AMENDED BY R.A. NO. 9174, AS WELL AS, POSSIBLE CONFLICT OF INTEREST OF DFPC OFFICIALS AND "SWEETHEART" DEALS AND CONTRACTS WITH FAVORED SUPPLIERS, AMONG OTHERS
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2018-10-10
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR02230
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON GOOD GOVERNMENT AND PUBLIC ACCOUNTABILITY TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY AND INVESTIGATION, INTO THE ALLEGATIONS OF IRREGULARITIES AND ANOMALIES IN THE OPERATION OF THE DUTY FREE PHILIPPINES CORPORATION (DFPC), PARTICULARLY WITH REGARDS TO ALLEGED VIOLATIONS OF R.A. NO. 6768, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE BALIKBAYAN LAW, AS AMENDED BY R.A. NO. 9174, AS WELL AS, POSSIBLE CONFLICT OF INTEREST OF DFPC OFFICIALS AND "SWEETHEART" DEALS AND CONTRACTS WITH FAVORED SUPPLIERS, AMONG OTHERS
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : VERGARA, ROSANNA "RIA" V.
DATE FILED : 2018-10-08
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON RULES ON 2018-10-10
